title: About
text:
About this Project
This project was created as part of Kane’s Free Data Science Bootcamp.

title: Mall Customer Segmentation
text:
Customer segmentation is a key marketing strategy that involves dividing a company’s customer base into distinct groups of individuals that share similar characteristics. These characteristics can include demographic factors (age, gender, income), behavioral patterns (purchase history, brand loyalty), psychographics (lifestyle, values), and geographic information (location).
By identifying these segments, businesses can tailor their marketing efforts, product development, and customer service to better meet the specific needs and preferences of each group. This targeted approach helps in improving customer satisfaction, enhancing marketing effectiveness, and increasing overall profitability.
